ygData.subject: Re: The Autobot Council
ygData.msgSnippet: Grimlock here came a booming voice from outside. The Dinobot leader walked into the doorway, and patted both Swoop and Sludge on the back. Then he looked way

"Grimlock here" came a booming voice from outside. The Dinobot leader
walked into the doorway, and patted both Swoop and Sludge on the back.
Then he looked way down at Cross-roads with discust. He knew that Sludge
and Swoop were friendlier than the rest of the Dinobots, but is still
disturbed him.

OOC: For those of you who saw the first two series of Generation 1, I
want to know how big you would suggest the Dinobots be, I was thinking
around 14 feet, (if you all remember how they towered over the rest, and
when they were introduced the Autobots kept mumbling "look at the size
of them. Holy Cybertron".
